structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 199, secs. 6 and 7..

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Authority for city-county building is optional -- Liberal construction.
